problem.markdown:
Review the graph assessing Penta dropout rates: Move the cursor over the vertical bars and read the information in the windows which pop up.
>>How is “dropout rate” defined and how is it calculated? (2 attempts)<<
(x) A. It is defined as the percentage of patients who come for a first visit but who fail to come for a subsequent visit. ( ) B. It is defined as the percentage of patients who come for a first visit and come for a subsequent visit. ( ) C. It is defined as the percentage of patients who come for a single visit. ( ) D. It is defined as the percentage of patients who fail to come for a single visit.
[explanation] The Dropout rate is defined as the percentage of patients who come for a first visit but who fail to come for a subsequent visit. [explanation]

multiplechoiceresponse.p: Review the graph assessing Penta dropout rates: Move the cursor over the vertical bars and read the information in the windows which pop up.
multiplechoiceresponse.label: How is “dropout rate” defined and how is it calculated? (2 attempts)

choicegroup.choice: A. It is defined as the percentage of patients who come for a first visit but who fail to come for a subsequent visit.
B. It is defined as the percentage of patients who come for a first visit and come for a subsequent visit.
C. It is defined as the percentage of patients who come for a single visit.
D. It is defined as the percentage of patients who fail to come for a single visit.

div.p: The Dropout rate is defined as the percentage of patients who come for a first visit but who fail to come for a subsequent visit.
